title: Web Accessibility Development
headline: Create accessible websites and apply WAI-ARIA guidelines with this free online course in Web Accessibility Development.
description: Learning the technical aspects of website development is a very important step in creating accessible website interfaces and in this free online course, you will learn the fundamental theory and uses of the Web Accessibility Initiative - Accessible Rich Internet Applications (WAI-ARIA). Explore this UI and UX course and learn how to apply the global Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) in developing accessible websites and content.
courseDescription:
Accessing modern technologies is often hard for people with disabilities and in this free online UX UI design course, you will learn why web accessibility is important, who it helps and the kinds of technology involved in making web infrastructure accessible.

The international Web Accessibility Initiative - Accessible Rich Internet Applications (WAI-ARIA) standard is then studied in-depth as an introduction to analyzing the various components that make up web accessibility, learning practical details on how to develop these components and studying how to ensure they meet the web accessibility standards.

Ensuring that website infrastructure, content and interfaces are accessible to everyone and anyone is fast-becoming an industry standard. This free online course on Web Accessibility Development will teach you how to improve your website, broaden your skills as a developer and learn how to ensure web accessibility for people with disabilities, so enrol today.
